Hexo Hexo Jade, CoffeeScript Hexo Markdown Markdown Hexo [](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/tag-plugins.html) Hexo Hexo [](https://hexo.io/themes/) [NexT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) # Hexo [](https://neveryu.github.io/guestbook/) ## Hexo : > [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) > [Git](http://git-scm.com/) npm Hexo ``` bash $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` ## Git * Windows git Download Now * Mac [Homebrew](http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew/)[MacPorts](http://www.macports.org/) [](http://sourceforge.net/projects/git-osx-installer/) * LinuxUbuntuDebian`sudo apt-get install git-core` * LinuxFedoraRed HatCentOS`sudo yum install git-core` ## Node.js Node.js [nvm](https://github.com/creationix/nvm)nvmNode Version Manager windows nvm [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows) nvm Download Now windowsnvm ``` bash $ nvm $ nvm install latest ``` `node -v` `Node.js`

`Node.js` Download Now

## Hexo Node.js npm Hexo ``` bash $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` Hexo D blog `D:\blog` Hexo ``` bash $ hexo init ``` ``` . _config.yml package.json scaffolds source | _drafts | _posts ``` ``` bash $ hexo g $ hexo s --debug ``` Hexo source _posts _() / Markdown HTML public http://localhost:4000/ Hexo ![hexo-next-one-1](http://p1.bqimg.com/567571/27324b740c9e91e2.png) ## NexT ### NexT Git checkout ``` bash $ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next ```

Hexo _config.yml Hexo

### NexT theme next NexT `hexo clean` Hexo ### Hexo `--debug` `hexo s --debug` ``` bash INFO Hexo is running at http://0.0.0.0:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop. ``` http://localhost:4000/

NexT NexT Scheme Muse

HTML5shiv is a javascript workaround to provide support for the new HTML 5 elements in IE Browsers older than IE 9.

  • HTML5 IE6IE7IE8
  • IE6IE7IE8 HTML5
  • IE HTML5 HTML5Shiv
  • HTML5Shiv HTML5 IE6-8

HTML5

  • <header>
  • <footer>
  • <nav>
  • <section>
  • <article>
  • <aside>

SEO HTML5 IE6/IE7/IE8 javascript html5shiv.js Bootstrap IE

HTML5 IE6-8 CSS CSS document.createElement(elementName) HTML5Shiv

HTML5 IEGoogleOpera Mozilla HTML HTML5 IE HTML5, IE8 HTML5 .

HTML5Shiv IE9 HTML5 head

The syntax for the HTML5shiv is :

html5shiv.js css :

HTML5 , div

No matter how ways what did you using, you should be initialize the new lable css.

html5shiv.js JavaScript IE6/7/8 ,,?
Facebook noscript xhtml html5 hack

xhtml

  • HTML5shiv is found within the <head> tag.
  • HTML5shiv is a javascript file that is referenced in a <script> tag.
  • You should usr HTML5shiv when you are using the new HTML5 element such as : <header>,<footer>,<nav>,<aside>,<article>
  • Download the latest version of HTML5shiv from github or reference the Open Source Software CDN version at https://oss.maxcdn.com/libs/html5shiv/3.7.0/html5shiv.js or https://cdn.bootcss.com/html5shiv/3.7.0/html5shiv.min.js.
  • You will require the HTML5shiv to provide compatibility for IE Browser older than IE 9.

Example

HTML 5 Document

If you created a new web page in HTML5,you would include the HTML5shiv as follows:

In this HTML 5 Document example,we have added HTML5shiv within the tag.In this case,the HTML5shiv is a javascript file called html5shiv.js found in the ./js directory.

If you did not want to download and store the HTML5shiv on your site,you could reference the version found on the Open Source Software CDN site.

Support two CDN site

HTML 4.0.1 Transitional Document

HTML5shiv does not apply to HTML 4.0.1 Transitional.

XHTML 1.0 Transitional Document

HTML5shiv does not apply to XHTML 1.0 Transitional.

XHTML 1.0 Strict Document

HTML5shiv does not apply to XHTML 1.0 Strict.

XHTML 1.1 Document

HTML5shiv does not apply to XHTML 1.1.

Tips

HTML5 html5shiv.js User-Agent

HTML5Shiv and Respond.js for IE8 support of HTML5 elements and media queries.

Post._content:
# NPM npm Node.js pip Python gem Ruby pear PHP npm Node.js Node.js Node.js npm # NPM npm Node.js Node.js - npm - npm - npm npm couchdb # NPM ## npm Node npm Node npm ``` $ sudo npm install npm@latest -g ``` Window ``` npm install npm -g ``` npm npm Node ``` bash # npm $ npm help # $ npm -l # npm $ npm -v # npm $ npm config list -l ``` ## ### npm init npm init package.json -fforce-yyes package.json ``` bash $ npm init -y ``` ### npm set npm set ``` bash $ npm set init-author-name 'Your name' $ npm set init-author-email 'Your email' $ npm set init-author-url 'http://yourdomain.com' $ npm set init-license 'MIT' ``` npm init npm init package.json ~/.npmrc npm config ### npm info npm info underscore ``` bash $ npm info underscore ``` JavaScript underscore info ``` bash $ npm info underscore description $ npm info underscore homepage $ npm info underscore version ``` ### npm search npm search npm ``` bash $ npm search <> ``` ### npm list npm list ``` bash $ npm list # global $ npm list -global # npm list $ npm list underscore ``` ### npm install npm `npm [install/i] [package_name]` #### npm http://npmjs.org node_modules Ruby gem Python pip npm gem pip npm npm API supervisor `npm install -g supervisor` supervisor supervisor `npm config set prefix ""` supervisor supervisor Node.js eslint gulp ** PATH ** node_modules || require | PATH| |:---:|:---:|:---:| |||| |||| ``` bash # $ npm install # $ sudo npm install -global $ sudo npm install -g ``` npm install Github ``` bash $ npm install git://github.com/package/path.git $ npm install git://github.com/package/path.git#0.1.0 ``` npm install node_modules npm -f --force ``` bash $ npm install --force ``` #### install @ ``` bash $ npm install sax@latest $ npm install sax@0.1.1 $ npm install sax@">=0.1.0 <0.2.0" ``` install packages.json > --save dependencies-S > --save-dev devDependencies-D ``` bash $ npm install sax --save $ npm install node-tap --save-dev # $ npm install sax -S $ npm install node-tap -D ``` ##### dependencies npm js `markdown-it` `^8.1.0` `8.1.0` npm install npm ``` javascript "dependencies": { "markdown-it": "^8.1.0" } ``` ##### devDependencies devDependencies npm ``` javascript "devDependencies": { "autoprefixer": "^6.4.0",0", "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.0.0", "babel-preset-stage-2": "^6.0.0", "babel-register": "^6.0.0", "webpack": "^1.13.2", "webpack-dev-middleware": "^1.8.3", "webpack-hot-middleware": "^2.12.2", "webpack-merge": "^0.14.1", "highlightjs": "^9.8.0" } ``` package.json npm install npm install dependencies devDependencies --production dependencies ``` bash $ npm install --production # $ NODE_ENV=production npm install ``` require ``` javascript var backbone = require('backbone') console.log(backbone.VERSION) ``` ### npm run npm package.json scripts npm package.json ``` javascript { "name": "myproject", "devDependencies": { "jshint": "latest", "browserify": "latest", "mocha": "latest" }, "scripts": { "lint": "jshint **.js", "test": "mocha test/" } } ``` #### scripts `npm run script-key` package.json `npm run dev` `node build/dev-server.js` scripts npm run npm run npm run-script ``` javascript // "scripts": { "dev": "node build/dev-server.js", "build": "node build/build.js", "docs": "node build/docs.js", "build-docs": "npm run docs & git checkout gh-pages & xcopy /sy dist\\* . & git add . & git commit -m 'auto-pages' & git push & git checkout master", "build-publish": "rmdir /S /Q lib & npm run build &git add . & git commit -m auto-build & npm version patch & npm publish & git push", "lint": "eslint --ext .js,.vue src" } ``` npm run package.json npm npm test npm run testnpm start npm run start ``` javascript "build": "npm run build-js && npm run build-css" ``` npm run build-js npm run build-css && & scripts node_modules/.bin bash bash ``` bash #!/bin/bash cd site/main browserify browser/main.js | uglifyjs -mc > static/bundle.js ``` build.sh scripts ``` javascript "build-js": "bin/build.sh" ``` ### pre- post- npm run pre- post- hook npm run lint npm prelint postlint npm run prelint npm run lint npm run postlint ``` javascript { "name": "myproject", "devDependencies": { "eslint": "latest" "karma": "latest" }, "scripts": { "lint": "eslint --cache --ext .js --ext .jsx src", "test": "karma start --log-leve=error karma.config.js --single-run=true", "pretest": "npm run lint", "posttest": "echo 'Finished running tests'" } } ``` package.json npm test 1. pretest 2. test 3. posttest prelint lint postlint ### npm bin npm bin Node .bin ``` bash # $ npm bin ./node_modules/.bin ``` # npm npm link require npm link `npm install -g express` express `npm link express ./node_modules/express -> /user/local/lib/node_modules/express` node_modules npm link package.json npm link # Node.js C/C++ Java.Net Node.js CommonJS npm Node.js JSON package.json CommonJS package.json bin JavaScript lib doc test Node.js package.json CommonJS package.json Node.js packgage.json main package.json main index.js index.node package.json CommonJS package.json name: description: version: keywords: maintainers: name email()web() contributors: maintainers bugs: bug licenses: type url repositories: type gitURL path dependencies: # npm init package.json index.js , ,, npm adduser npm whoami , package.json npm publish http://search.npmjs.org/ npm install neveryumodule , package.json version , npm publish npm unpublish

*json *

## mac
### 
```

```
 `Please try running this command again as root/Administrator.`
```
sudo -s

```

### 


### 
 Homebrew  Homebrew  Yarn
``` js
brew install yarn

```

# Yarn 
Yarn 
```
//  yarn 
yarn config get registry

yarn config list

> registry: 'https://registry.yarnpkg.com'
```

```

yarn config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
```

# Yarn 

- `npm install` === `yarn`   install
- `npm install taco --save` === `yarn add taco`   taco `package.json` 
- `npm uninstall taco --save` === `yarn remove taco`
- `npm install taco --save-dev` === `yarn add taco --dev`
- `npm update --save` === `yarn upgrade`

-

- `npm install taco@latest --save` === `yarn add taco`
- `npm install taco --global` === `yarn global add taco`    global 

> yarnyarn installpackage.json"dependencies"

-

- `npm init` === `yarn init`
- `npm init --yes/-y` === `yarn init --yes/-y`
- `npm link` === `yarn link`
- `npm outdated` === `yarn outdated`
- `npm publish` === `yarn publish`
- `npm run` === `yarn run`
- `npm cache clean` === `yarn cache clean`
- `npm login` === `yarn login`
- `npm test` === `yarn test`

## Yarn 
- `yarn licenses ls`   
- `yarn licenses generate`    license
- `yarn why taco`    taco
- `yarn why vuepress`    vuepress


# 
Yarn 

-  `npm`  `bower` 
- 
-  JS API
-  CLI
